title: Organizational Learning Simulation for Strengthening Diversity Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic leadership and human resource management concepts within organizations
context.additional_context: VR-based simulations replicate real organizational environments, emphasizing small-group collaborative learning. Customizable scenarios are available in a BYOD environment, tailored to individual learning paces and organizational characteristics.

learning_goals: Learners can design workplace diversity management strategies and implement/evaluate them in VR simulation environments
Learners can propose plans to establish a 'Community of Practice' where organizational members share diversity-related experiences
Learners can plan and execute diversity policy improvement projects based on organizational memory and report results using measurable indicators.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
